page.topic: Server Side Event Handlers - Data Submitted - JSON
page.description: When the UX makes any type of Ajax callback, the data that are submitted (including data in Repeating Sections) are now available in a convenient new property called

section.description: For example, assume your UX had the following controls: Firstname, Lastname and a Repeating Section called 'CONTAINER_1' with AddressType and Address. The e.dataSubmittedJSON value might look like this:
You can use the Xbasic JSON_Parse() function to parse this JSON string.
